A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Almost perfect. Definitely had some bad parts\, like the Finn and Rose storyline\, and i wish Kylo or Rey fully committed to going to the other side\, this would be something we haven’t really seen in a SW film. But this movie puts me on an emotional ride like no other one\, and Adam Driver’s acting is superb! I love the theme of failure and not giving the audience what they want. I\, got one\, didn’t feel like they betrayed Luke’s character\, just made him evolved in a believable way. 3rd favorite Star Wars movie!
